remarks: Projectivity map of the zero subspace.  Part of property (f) in [Baer] p. 40.  TODO: does proof need to be this long for this simple fact? (Contributed by NM, 15-Mar-2015.)
statement:
mapd0.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
mapd0.m $e |- M = ( ( mapd ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapd0.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapd0.o $e |- O = ( 0g ` U ) $.
mapd0.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapd0.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` C ) $.
mapd0.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
mapd0 $p |- ( ph -> ( M ` { O } ) = { .0. } ) $.
